div.ab:
شهد إبرهيم بن عبيد اللّه بن جعفر على
إقرار المقر بما فيه في تأريخه
شهد نــعمان بن يوسف بن طيب على إقرار
المقر بما فيه وكتب بخطّه في تأريخه
ما فيه وكتب بخطّه في تأريخه
شهد عبد الرّحمن بن محمّد بن هرون على إقرار
المقر المسمّا بما فيه وكتب بخطّه في تأريخه

**** **** **** ****
šahida ʾibrāhīmu bnu ʿubaydi ăl lāhi bni ǧaʿfara ʿalà
ʾiqrāri ăl muqirri bi mā fī hi fī taʾrīḫi hi
šahida nuʿmānu bnu yūsufa bni ṭīb:in ʿalà ʾiqrāri
ăl muqirri bi mā fī hi wa kataba bi ḫaṭṭi hi fī taʾrīḫi hi
mā fī hi wa kataba bi ḫaṭṭi hi fī taʾrīḫi hi
šahida ʿabdu ăr raḥmāni bnu muḥammadi bni hārūna ʿalà ʾiqrāri
ăl muqirri ăl musammā bi mā fī hi wa kataba bi ḫaṭṭi hi fī taʾrīḫi hi

Ibrahîm b. ʿUbaid Allâh b. Ǧaʿfar is witness to
the acknowledgment by the acknowledger respecting that which (is contained) herein on its date.
Nuʿmân b. Yûsuf b. Ṭîb is witness to the acknowledgment
by the acknowledger respecting that which (is contained) herein, and he has written (it) in his (own) handwriting on its date.
what is contained herein, and he has written (it) in his (own) handwriting on its date.
ʿAbd ar-Raḥmân b. Muḥammad b. Harûn is witness to the acknowledgment
by the acknowledger named respecting that which (is contained) herein, and he has written (it) in his (own) handwriting on its date.
